Articles.Content:
It pains me to say this but, I pirated KSP. It was back in the 0.18 days, I kept seeing the game on Steam but wasn't sure what it was and wasn't aware of the demo's existence so I turned to piracy.

Now, I'm not condoning piracy (especially of indie developments) but had it not been for it I wouldn't have bought the game a few days before 0.19 came out, still I feel I should apologise to Squad and praise them for creating the only thing that has caused me to be banned from using the other half's laptop for playing "that stupid game" until the early hours.

As an apology, if paid DLC is ever released I will buy it on day one, even if what it adds is purely cosmetic and pointless.

Well, good to hear to purchased the game.

I highly doubt there will be paid DLC -- don't go there!

A nice big Expansion Pack, or a KSP v2 is more likely.

Please read the rules, particularly rule 2.2a.

Locked.

Edited July 8, 2014 by technicalfool
